Translations.Text: Tumi ki dekho ni tomara prabhu kemana karechilena hasti-bahinira prati
tadera cakranta tini ki byarthataya paryabasita karena ni
ara tadera upare tini pathalena jhamke jhamke pakhira dala
yara tadera achare chila sakta-kathina patharera gaye
phale tini tadera baniye dilena kheye phela kharera mato.
